ayah: حمٓ
ayah_translit: ha-meem
ayah_english: Ha Meem

ayah: تَنزِيلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ
ayah_translit: tanzilu al-kitabi mina al-lahi al-'azizi al-hakimi
ayah_english: (The) revelation (of) the Book (is) from Allah the All-Mighty the All-Wise

ayah: إِنَّ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: inna fi al-samawati wal-ardi laayatin lil'mu'minina
ayah_english: Indeed in the heavens and the earth surely (are) Signs for the believers

ayah: إِنَّ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

ayah: وَفِي خَلۡقِكُمۡ وَمَا يَبُثُّ مِن دَآبَّةٍ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُوقِنُونَ
ayah_translit: wafi khalqikum wama yabuthu min dabbatin ayatun liqawmin yuqinuna
ayah_english: And in your creation and what He disperses of (the) moving creatures (are) Signs for a people who are certain

ayah: وَفِي خَلۡقِكُمۡ وَمَا يَبُثُّ مِن دَآبَّةٍ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُوقِنُونَ

ayah: وَٱخۡتِلَٰفِ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ وَمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مِن رِّزۡقٖ فَأَحۡيَا بِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَا وَتَصۡرِيفِ ٱلرِّيَٰحِ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَعۡقِلُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-ikh'tilafi al-layli wal-nahari wama anzala al-lahu mina al-samai min riz'qin fa-ahya bihi al-arda ba'da mawtiha watasrifi al-riyahi ayatun liqawmin ya'qiluna
ayah_english: And (in the) alternation (of) the night and the day and what Allah sends down Allah sends down from the sky of (the) provision and gives life thereby (to) the earth after its death and (in) directing of (the) winds (are) Signs for a people who reason

ayah: وَٱخۡتِلَٰفِ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ وَمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مِن رِّزۡقٖ فَأَحۡيَا بِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَا وَتَصۡرِيفِ ٱلرِّيَٰحِ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَعۡقِلُونَ

ayah: وَٱخۡتِلَٰفِ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ وَمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مِن رِّزۡقٖ فَأَحۡيَا بِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَا وَتَصۡرِيفِ ٱلرِّيَٰحِ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَعۡقِلُونَ

ayah: تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱللَّهِ نَتۡلُوهَا عَلَيۡكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ فَبِأَيِّ حَدِيثِۭ بَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ وَءَايَٰتِهِۦ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayah_translit: til'ka ayatu al-lahi natluha alayka bil-haqi fabi-ayyi hadithin ba'da al-lahi waayatihi yu'minuna
ayah_english: These (are the) Verses (of) Allah We recite them to you in truth Then in what statement after Allah and His Verses will they believe

ayah: وَيۡلٞ لِّكُلِّ أَفَّاكٍ أَثِيمٖ
ayah_translit: waylun likulli affakin athimin
ayah_english: Woe to every liar sinful

ayah: وَيۡلٞ لِّكُلِّ أَفَّاكٍ أَثِيمٖ
ayah_translit: waylun likulli affakin athimin

ayah: وَيۡلٞ لِّكُلِّ أَفَّاكٍ أَثِيمٖ

ayah: وَيۡلٞ لِّكُلِّ أَفَّاكٍ أَثِيمٖ
ayah_translit: waylun likulli affakin athimin
ayah_english: Woe to every liar sinful

ayah: يَسۡمَعُ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ثُمَّ يُصِرُّ مُسۡتَكۡبِرٗا كَأَن لَّمۡ يَسۡمَعۡهَاۖ فَبَشِّرۡهُ بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٖ
ayah_translit: yasma'u ayati al-lahi tut'la alayhi thumma yusirru mus'takbiran ka-an lam yasma'ha fabashir'hu bi'adhabin alimin
ayah_english: Who hears (the) Verses (of) Allah recited to him then persists arrogantly as if not he heard them So give him tidings (of) a punishment painful

ayah: يَسۡمَعُ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ثُمَّ يُصِرُّ مُسۡتَكۡبِرٗا كَأَن لَّمۡ يَسۡمَعۡهَاۖ فَبَشِّرۡهُ بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٖ

ayah_translit: yasma'u ayati al-lahi tut'la alayhi thumma yusirru mus'takbiran ka-an lam yasma'ha fabashir'hu bi'adhabin alimin
ayah_english: Who hears (the) Verses (of) Allah recited to him then persists arrogantly as if not he heard them So give him tidings (of) a punishment painful

ayah: وَإِذَا عَلِمَ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا شَيۡـًٔا ٱتَّخَذَهَا هُزُوًاۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مُّهِينٞ
ayah_translit: wa-idha alima min ayatina shayan ittakhadhaha huzuwan ulaika lahum adhabun muhinun
ayah_english: And when he knows of Our Verses anything he takes them (in) ridicule Those for them (is) a punishment humiliating

ayah_english: And when he knows of Our Verses anything he takes them (in) ridicule Those for them (is) a punishment humiliating

ayah: مِّن وَرَآئِهِمۡ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَلَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُم مَّا كَسَبُواْ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا مَا ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡلِيَآءَۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ
ayah_translit: min waraihim jahannamu wala yugh'ni anhum ma kasabu shayan wala ma ittakhadhu min duni al-lahi awliyaa walahum adhabun azimun
ayah_english: Before them Before them (is) Hell and not will avail them what they had earned anything and not what they had taken besides besides Allah (as) protectors And for them (is) a punishment great

ayah: مِّن وَرَآئِهِمۡ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَلَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُم مَّا كَسَبُواْ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا مَا ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡلِيَآءَۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ
ayah_translit: min waraihim jahannamu wala yugh'ni anhum ma kasabu shayan wala ma ittakhadhu min duni al-lahi awliyaa walahum adhabun azimun

ayah: هَٰذَا هُدٗىۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مِّن رِّجۡزٍ أَلِيمٌ
ayah_translit: hadha hudan wa-alladhina kafaru biayati rabbihim lahum adhabun min rij'zin alimun
ayah_english: This (is) guidance And those who disbelieve in (the) Verses (of) their Lord for them (is) a punishment of filth painful

ayah: هَٰذَا هُدٗىۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مِّن رِّجۡزٍ أَلِيمٌ

ayah: ۞ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡبَحۡرَ لِتَجۡرِيَ ٱلۡفُلۡكُ فِيهِ بِأَمۡرِهِۦ وَلِتَبۡتَغُواْ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦ وَلَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ
ayah_translit: al-lahu alladhi sakhara lakumu al-bahra litajriya al-ful'ku fihi bi-amrihi walitabtaghu min fadlihi wala'allakum tashkuruna
ayah_english: Allah (is) the One Who subjected to you the sea that may sail the ships therein by His Command and that you may seek of His Bounty and that you may give thanks

ayah: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُم مَّا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا مِّنۡهُۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: wasakhara lakum ma fi al-samawati wama fi al-ardi jami'an min'hu inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yatafakkaruna
ayah_english: And He has subjected to you whatever (is) in the heavens and whatever (is) in the earth all from Him Indeed in that surely are Signs for a people who give thought

ayah: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُم مَّا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا مِّنۡهُۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ

ayah_english: And He has subjected to you whatever (is) in the heavens and whatever (is) in the earth all from Him Indeed in that surely are Signs for a people who give thought

ayah: قُل لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ يَغۡفِرُواْ لِلَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ أَيَّامَ ٱللَّهِ لِيَجۡزِيَ قَوۡمَۢا بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
ayah_translit: qul lilladhina amanu yaghfiru lilladhina la yarjuna ayyama al-lahi liyajziya qawman bima kanu yaksibuna
ayah_english: Say to those who believe (to) forgive those who (do) not hope (for the) days (of) Allah that He may recompense a people for what they used (to) earn

ayah: قُل لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ يَغۡفِرُواْ لِلَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ أَيَّامَ ٱللَّهِ لِيَجۡزِيَ قَوۡمَۢا بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

ayah: مَنۡ عَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَلِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ وَمَنۡ أَسَآءَ فَعَلَيۡهَاۖ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمۡ تُرۡجَعُونَ
ayah_translit: man amila salihan falinafsihi waman asaa fa'alayha thumma ila rabbikum tur'ja'una
ayah_english: Whoever does a righteous deed then it is for his soul and whoever does evil then it (is) against it Then to your Lord you will be returned

ayah_translit: man amila salihan falinafsihi waman asaa fa'alayha thumma ila rabbikum tur'ja'una
ayah_english: Whoever does a righteous deed then it is for his soul and whoever does evil then it (is) against it Then to your Lord you will be returned

ayah: مَنۡ عَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَلِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ وَمَنۡ أَسَآءَ فَعَلَيۡهَاۖ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمۡ تُرۡجَعُونَ
ayah_translit: man amila salihan falinafsihi waman asaa fa'alayha thumma ila rabbikum tur'ja'una

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡحُكۡمَ وَٱلنُّبُوَّةَ وَرَزَقۡنَٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَٰتِ وَفَضَّلۡنَٰهُمۡ عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: walaqad atayna bani is'raila al-kitaba wal-huk'ma wal-nubuwata warazaqnahum mina al-tayibati wafaddalnahum ala al-'alamina
ayah_english: And certainly We gave (the) Children of Israel (the) Children of Israel the Book and the wisdom and the Prophethood and We provided them of the good things and We preferred them over the worlds

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡحُكۡمَ وَٱلنُّبُوَّةَ وَرَزَقۡنَٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَٰتِ وَفَضَّلۡنَٰهُمۡ عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

ayah: وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُم بَيِّنَٰتٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَمۡرِۖ فَمَا ٱخۡتَلَفُوٓاْ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡعِلۡمُ بَغۡيَۢا بَيۡنَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَقۡضِي بَيۡنَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فِيمَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَ
ayah_translit: waataynahum bayyinatin mina al-amri fama ikh'talafu illa min ba'di ma jaahumu al-'il'mu baghyan baynahum inna rabbaka yaqdi baynahum yawma al-qiyamati fima kanu fihi yakhtalifuna
ayah_english: And We gave them clear proofs of the matter And not they differed except after after [what] came to them the knowledge (out of) envy between themselves Indeed your Lord will judge between them (on the) Day (of) the Resurrection about what they used (to) therein differ

ayah: وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُم بَيِّنَٰتٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَمۡرِۖ فَمَا ٱخۡتَلَفُوٓاْ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡعِلۡمُ بَغۡيَۢا بَيۡنَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَقۡضِي بَيۡنَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فِيمَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَ

ayah: ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَٰكَ عَلَىٰ شَرِيعَةٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَمۡرِ فَٱتَّبِعۡهَا وَلَا تَتَّبِعۡ أَهۡوَآءَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: thumma ja'alnaka ala shari'atin mina al-amri fa-ittabi'ha wala tattabi' ahwaa alladhina la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: Then We put you on an ordained way of the matter so follow it and (do) not follow (the) desires (of) those who (do) not know

ayah: ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَٰكَ عَلَىٰ شَرِيعَةٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَمۡرِ فَٱتَّبِعۡهَا وَلَا تَتَّبِعۡ أَهۡوَآءَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: thumma ja'alnaka ala shari'atin mina al-amri fa-ittabi'ha wala tattabi' ahwaa alladhina la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: Then We put you on an ordained way of the matter so follow it and (do) not follow (the) desires (of) those who (do) not know

ayah: ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَٰكَ عَلَىٰ شَرِيعَةٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَمۡرِ فَٱتَّبِعۡهَا وَلَا تَتَّبِعۡ أَهۡوَآءَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah: إِنَّهُمۡ لَن يُغۡنُواْ عَنكَ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـٔٗاۚ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلِيَآءُ بَعۡضٖۖ وَٱللَّهُ وَلِيُّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ
ayah_translit: innahum lan yugh'nu anka mina al-lahi shayan wa-inna al-zalimina ba'duhum awliyau ba'din wal-lahu waliyyu al-mutaqina
ayah_english: Indeed they never will avail you against Allah (in) anything And indeed the wrongdoers some of them (are) allies (of) others and Allah (is the) Protector (of) the righteous

ayah: إِنَّهُمۡ لَن يُغۡنُواْ عَنكَ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـٔٗاۚ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلِيَآءُ بَعۡضٖۖ وَٱللَّهُ وَلِيُّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

ayah: هَٰذَا بَصَـٰٓئِرُ لِلنَّاسِ وَهُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٞ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُوقِنُونَ
ayah_translit: hadha basairu lilnnasi wahudan warahmatun liqawmin yuqinuna
ayah_english: This (is) enlightenment for mankind and guidance and mercy for a people who are certain

ayah: أَمۡ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱجۡتَرَحُواْ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ أَن نَّجۡعَلَهُمۡ كَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ سَوَآءٗ مَّحۡيَاهُمۡ وَمَمَاتُهُمۡۚ سَآءَ مَا يَحۡكُمُونَ
ayah_translit: am hasiba alladhina ij'tarahu al-sayiati an naj'alahum ka-alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati sawaan mahyahum wamamatuhum saa ma yahkumuna
ayah_english: Do think those who commit evil deeds that We will make them like those who believed and did righteous deeds equal (in) their life and their death Evil is what they judge

ayah: أَمۡ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱجۡتَرَحُواْ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ أَن نَّجۡعَلَهُمۡ كَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ سَوَآءٗ مَّحۡيَاهُمۡ وَمَمَاتُهُمۡۚ سَآءَ مَا يَحۡكُمُونَ

ayah: أَمۡ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱجۡتَرَحُواْ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ أَن نَّجۡعَلَهُمۡ كَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ سَوَآءٗ مَّحۡيَاهُمۡ وَمَمَاتُهُمۡۚ سَآءَ مَا يَحۡكُمُونَ

ayah: وَخَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلِتُجۡزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفۡسِۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتۡ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: wakhalaqa al-lahu al-samawati wal-arda bil-haqi walituj'za kullu nafsin bima kasabat wahum la yuz'lamuna
ayah_english: And Allah created And Allah created the heavens and the earth in truth and that may be recompensed every soul for what it has earned and they will not be wronged will not be wronged

ayah: أَفَرَءَيۡتَ مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَٰهَهُۥ هَوَىٰهُ وَأَضَلَّهُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ عِلۡمٖ وَخَتَمَ عَلَىٰ سَمۡعِهِۦ وَقَلۡبِهِۦ وَجَعَلَ عَلَىٰ بَصَرِهِۦ غِشَٰوَةٗ فَمَن يَهۡدِيهِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ٱللَّهِۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: afara-ayta mani ittakhadha ilahahu hawahu wa-adallahu al-lahu ala il'min wakhatama ala sam'ihi waqalbihi waja'ala ala basarihi ghishawatan faman yahdihi min ba'di al-lahi afala tadhakkaruna
ayah_english: Have you seen (he) who takes (as) his god his desire and Allah lets him go astray and Allah lets him go astray knowingly knowingly and He sets a seal upon his hearing and his heart and puts over his vision a veil Then who will guide him after after Allah Then will not you receive admonition

ayah_english: Have you seen (he) who takes (as) his god his desire and Allah lets him go astray and Allah lets him go astray knowingly knowingly and He sets a seal upon his hearing and his heart and puts over his vision a veil Then who will guide him after after Allah Then will not you receive admonition

ayah: أَفَرَءَيۡتَ مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَٰهَهُۥ هَوَىٰهُ وَأَضَلَّهُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ عِلۡمٖ وَخَتَمَ عَلَىٰ سَمۡعِهِۦ وَقَلۡبِهِۦ وَجَعَلَ عَلَىٰ بَصَرِهِۦ غِشَٰوَةٗ فَمَن يَهۡدِيهِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ٱللَّهِۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

ayah_english: Have you seen (he) who takes (as) his god his desire and Allah lets him go astray and Allah lets him go astray knowingly knowingly and He sets a seal upon his hearing and his heart and puts over his vision a veil Then who will guide him after after Allah Then will not you receive admonition

ayah: وَقَالُواْ مَا هِيَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنۡيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحۡيَا وَمَا يُهۡلِكُنَآ إِلَّا ٱلدَّهۡرُۚ وَمَا لَهُم بِذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ عِلۡمٍۖ إِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا يَظُنُّونَ
ayah_translit: waqalu ma hiya illa hayatuna al-dun'ya namutu wanahya wama yuh'likuna illa al-dahru wama lahum bidhalika min il'min in hum illa yazunnuna
ayah_english: And they say Not it (is) but our life (of) the world we die and we live and not destroys us except the time And not for them of that any knowledge not they (do) but guess

ayah_english: And they say Not it (is) but our life (of) the world we die and we live and not destroys us except the time And not for them of that any knowledge not they (do) but guess

ayah: وَقَالُواْ مَا هِيَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنۡيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحۡيَا وَمَا يُهۡلِكُنَآ إِلَّا ٱلدَّهۡرُۚ وَمَا لَهُم بِذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ عِلۡمٍۖ إِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا يَظُنُّونَ
ayah_translit: waqalu ma hiya illa hayatuna al-dun'ya namutu wanahya wama yuh'likuna illa al-dahru wama lahum bidhalika min il'min in hum illa yazunnuna
ayah_english: And they say Not it (is) but our life (of) the world we die and we live and not destroys us except the time And not for them of that any knowledge not they (do) but guess

ayah: وَإِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتُنَا بَيِّنَٰتٖ مَّا كَانَ حُجَّتَهُمۡ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُواْ ٱئۡتُواْ بِـَٔابَآئِنَآ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-idha tut'la alayhim ayatuna bayyinatin ma kana hujjatahum illa an qalu i'tu biabaina in kuntum sadiqina
ayah_english: And when are recited to them Our Verses clear not is their argument except that they say Bring our forefathers if you are truthful

ayah: وَإِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتُنَا بَيِّنَٰتٖ مَّا كَانَ حُجَّتَهُمۡ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُواْ ٱئۡتُواْ بِـَٔابَآئِنَآ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

ayah: قُلِ ٱللَّهُ يُحۡيِيكُمۡ ثُمَّ يُمِيتُكُمۡ ثُمَّ يَجۡمَعُكُمۡ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: quli al-lahu yuh'yikum thumma yumitukum thumma yajma'ukum ila yawmi al-qiyamati la rayba fihi walakinna akthara al-nasi la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: Say Allah gives you life then causes you to die then He will gather you to (the) Day (of) the Resurrection no doubt about it But most (of) the people (do) not know

ayah: قُلِ ٱللَّهُ يُحۡيِيكُمۡ ثُمَّ يُمِيتُكُمۡ ثُمَّ يَجۡمَعُكُمۡ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: quli al-lahu yuh'yikum thumma yumitukum thumma yajma'ukum ila yawmi al-qiyamati la rayba fihi walakinna akthara al-nasi la ya'lamuna

ayah: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَيَوۡمَ تَقُومُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَخۡسَرُ ٱلۡمُبۡطِلُونَ
ayah_translit: walillahi mul'ku al-samawati wal-ardi wayawma taqumu al-sa'atu yawma-idhin yakhsaru al-mub'tiluna
ayah_english: And for Allah (is the) dominion (of) the heavens and the earth and (the) Day is established the Hour that Day will lose the falsifiers

ayah: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَيَوۡمَ تَقُومُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَخۡسَرُ ٱلۡمُبۡطِلُونَ

ayah: وَتَرَىٰ كُلَّ أُمَّةٖ جَاثِيَةٗۚ كُلُّ أُمَّةٖ تُدۡعَىٰٓ إِلَىٰ كِتَٰبِهَا ٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُجۡزَوۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: watara kulla ummatin jathiyatan kullu ummatin tud'a ila kitabiha al-yawma tuj'zawna ma kuntum ta'maluna
ayah_english: And you will see every nation kneeling Every nation will be called to its record Today you will be recompensed (for) what you used (to) do

ayah: وَتَرَىٰ كُلَّ أُمَّةٖ جَاثِيَةٗۚ كُلُّ أُمَّةٖ تُدۡعَىٰٓ إِلَىٰ كِتَٰبِهَا ٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُجۡزَوۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

ayah: هَٰذَا كِتَٰبُنَا يَنطِقُ عَلَيۡكُم بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا نَسۡتَنسِخُ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: hadha kitabuna yantiqu alaykum bil-haqi inna kunna nastansikhu ma kuntum ta'maluna
ayah_english: This Our Record speaks about you in truth Indeed We [We] used (to) transcribe what you used (to) do

ayah: هَٰذَا كِتَٰبُنَا يَنطِقُ عَلَيۡكُم بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا نَسۡتَنسِخُ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

ayah: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ فَيُدۡخِلُهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ فِي رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ
ayah_translit: fa-amma alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati fayud'khiluhum rabbuhum fi rahmatihi dhalika huwa al-fawzu al-mubinu
ayah_english: Then as for those who believed and did [the] righteous deeds will admit them their Lord in(to) His mercy That [it] (is) the success clear

ayah: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَفَلَمۡ تَكُنۡ ءَايَٰتِي تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡكُمۡ فَٱسۡتَكۡبَرۡتُمۡ وَكُنتُمۡ قَوۡمٗا مُّجۡرِمِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-amma alladhina kafaru afalam takun ayati tut'la alaykum fa-is'takbartum wakuntum qawman muj'rimina
ayah_english: But as for those who disbelieved Then were not Then were not My Verses recited to you but you were proud and you became a people criminals

ayah: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَفَلَمۡ تَكُنۡ ءَايَٰتِي تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡكُمۡ فَٱسۡتَكۡبَرۡتُمۡ وَكُنتُمۡ قَوۡمٗا مُّجۡرِمِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-amma alladhina kafaru afalam takun ayati tut'la alaykum fa-is'takbartum wakuntum qawman muj'rimina
ayah_english: But as for those who disbelieved Then were not Then were not My Verses recited to you but you were proud and you became a people criminals

ayah: وَإِذَا قِيلَ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهَا قُلۡتُم مَّا نَدۡرِي مَا ٱلسَّاعَةُ إِن نَّظُنُّ إِلَّا ظَنّٗا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُسۡتَيۡقِنِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-idha qila inna wa'da al-lahi haqqun wal-sa'atu la rayba fiha qul'tum ma nadri ma al-sa'atu in nazunnu illa zannan wama nahnu bimus'tayqinina
ayah_english: And when it was said indeed (the) Promise (of) Allah (is) true and the Hour (there is) no doubt about it you said Not we know what the Hour (is) Not we think except an assumption and not we (are) convinced

ayah: وَبَدَا لَهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا عَمِلُواْ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
ayah_translit: wabada lahum sayyiatu ma amilu wahaqa bihim ma kanu bihi yastahziuna
ayah_english: And (will) appear to them (the) evil (of) what they did and (will) envelop them what they used [at it] (to) mock

ayah_english: And (will) appear to them (the) evil (of) what they did and (will) envelop them what they used [at it] (to) mock

ayah: وَبَدَا لَهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا عَمِلُواْ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

ayah: وَقِيلَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ نَنسَىٰكُمۡ كَمَا نَسِيتُمۡ لِقَآءَ يَوۡمِكُمۡ هَٰذَا وَمَأۡوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن نَّـٰصِرِينَ
ayah_translit: waqila al-yawma nansakum kama nasitum liqaa yawmikum hadha wamawakumu al-naru wama lakum min nasirina
ayah_english: And it will be said Today We forget you as you forgot (the) meeting (of) this Day of yours (of) this Day of yours and your abode (is) the Fire and not for you any helpers

ayah: ذَٰلِكُم بِأَنَّكُمُ ٱتَّخَذۡتُمۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ هُزُوٗا وَغَرَّتۡكُمُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۚ فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَا يُخۡرَجُونَ مِنۡهَا وَلَا هُمۡ يُسۡتَعۡتَبُونَ
ayah_translit: dhalikum bi-annakumu ittakhadhtum ayati al-lahi huzuwan wagharratkumu al-hayatu al-dun'ya fal-yawma la yukh'rajuna min'ha wala hum yus'ta'tabuna
ayah_english: That (is) because you took (the) Verses (of) Allah (in) ridicule and deceived you the life (of) the world So this Day not they will be brought forth from it and not they will be asked to appease

ayah: ذَٰلِكُم بِأَنَّكُمُ ٱتَّخَذۡتُمۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ هُزُوٗا وَغَرَّتۡكُمُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۚ فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَا يُخۡرَجُونَ مِنۡهَا وَلَا هُمۡ يُسۡتَعۡتَبُونَ

ayah: ذَٰلِكُم بِأَنَّكُمُ ٱتَّخَذۡتُمۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ هُزُوٗا وَغَرَّتۡكُمُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۚ فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَا يُخۡرَجُونَ مِنۡهَا وَلَا هُمۡ يُسۡتَعۡتَبُونَ

ayah_english: That (is) because you took (the) Verses (of) Allah (in) ridicule and deceived you the life (of) the world So this Day not they will be brought forth from it and not they will be asked to appease

ayah: فَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَرَبِّ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: falillahi al-hamdu rabbi al-samawati warabbi al-ardi rabbi al-'alamina
ayah_english: Then for Allah (is) all the praise (the) Lord (of) the heavens and (the) Lord (of) the earth (the) lord (of) the worlds

ayah: فَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَرَبِّ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

ayah: فَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَرَبِّ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: falillahi al-hamdu rabbi al-samawati warabbi al-ardi rabbi al-'alamina
ayah_english: Then for Allah (is) all the praise (the) Lord (of) the heavens and (the) Lord (of) the earth (the) lord (of) the worlds

ayah: وَلَهُ ٱلۡكِبۡرِيَآءُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
ayah_translit: walahu al-kib'riyau fi al-samawati wal-ardi wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
ayah_english: And for Him (is) the greatness in the heavens and the earth and He (is) the All-Mighty the All-Wise

ayah: وَلَهُ ٱلۡكِبۡرِيَآءُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
